languages.text: "Если лишь свет Императора ведет нас вперед, но только истинные боги даруют силу... Возможен ли мир во вселенной?"
"If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"
languages.original_text: "Если лишь свет Императора ведет нас вперед, но только истинные боги даруют силу... Возможен ли мир во вселенной?"

traits.locale_text: "If only the light of the Emperor can be our guiding beacon, yet only the true gods can grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all the corners of the universe?"
"If only the light of the Emperor can be our guiding beacon, yet only the true gods can grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all the corners of the universe?"
"If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"
"If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"
"If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

languages.text: “如果只依靠神皇的圣光就能指引我们前进的方向，但只有真正的神明才能授予力量……我们真的可能在整个宇宙中实现和平吗？”
languages.original_text: "If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

traits.locale_text: “如果只依靠神皇的圣光就能指引我们前进的方向，但只有真正的神明才能授予力量……我们真的可能在整个宇宙中实现和平吗？”

languages.text: «Si la luz del Emperador es lo único que puede guiarnos, pero solo los dioses verdaderos conceden poder... ¿es siquiera posible alcanzar la paz en todos los confines del universo?».
languages.original_text: "If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

traits.locale_text: «Si la luz del Emperador es lo único que puede guiarnos, pero solo los dioses verdaderos conceden poder... ¿es siquiera posible alcanzar la paz en todos los confines del universo?».

languages.text: « Si la lumière de l'Empereur peut nous guider dans les ténèbres, mais que seuls les vrais dieux peuvent nous octroyer le pouvoir... est-il possible d'instaurer la paix dans chaque recoin de l'univers ? »
languages.original_text: "If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

traits.locale_text: « Si la lumière de l'Empereur peut nous guider dans les ténèbres, mais que seuls les vrais dieux peuvent nous octroyer le pouvoir... est-il possible d'instaurer la paix dans chaque recoin de l'univers ? »

languages.text: "Wenn das Licht des Imperators allein unser Leuchtsignal sein kann, aber nur wahre Götter Macht gewähren ... ist dann Frieden in allen Ecken des Universums überhaupt möglich?"
languages.original_text: "If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das Licht des Imperators allein unser Leuchtsignal sein kann, aber nur wahre Götter Macht gewähren ... ist dann Frieden in allen Ecken des Universums überhaupt möglich?"

languages.text: 「皇帝の光だけが我々の道しるべであり、真の神々だけが力を与えられるとしたら…宇宙の隅々まで平和を実現することは可能なのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の光だけが我々の道しるべであり、真の神々だけが力を与えられるとしたら…宇宙の隅々まで平和を実現することは可能なのだろうか？」

languages.text: "İmparator'un ışığı tek başına bize yol gösterebiliyorsa ama yalnızca gerçek tanrılar güç bağışlıyorsa... Evrenin her bir köşesinde barışı sağlamak mümkün müdür?"
languages.original_text: "If the light of the Emperor alone can be our guiding beacon, yet only true gods grant power... Is it possible to achieve peace in all corners of the universe?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un ışığı tek başına bize yol gösterebiliyorsa ama yalnızca gerçek tanrılar güç bağışlıyorsa... Evrenin her bir köşesinde barışı sağlamak mümkün müdür?"
